sentences.en: A footpath runs down the hill.
A knot of people was standing on the footpath outside his units.
sentences.cn: 一群人站在他家门外的小路上.

sentences.en: A little knot of people collected on the footpath to pay homage to the snorting motor.
sentences.cn: 人行道上聚集了一小堆人,对这辆呼哧呼哧的汽车啧啧赞叹.

sentences.en: An old, close - bitten pasture, with a footpath wandering across it and a molehill here and there.
sentences.cn: 这古老的牧场荒草参差, 一条曲曲弯弯的小径,一片鼹鼠拱起的土丘.

sentences.en: Fans blasted his music and danced energetically to the delight of tourists and passers-by on the crowded footpath.
sentences.cn: 在这条拥挤的人行道上，歌迷们向兴致盎然的游客和路人播放着杰克逊的音乐，并随之跳起劲舞。

sentences.en: Follow the footpath and you'll eventually hit the road.
sentences.cn: 沿这条小径走终究会见到大路的.

sentences.en: Follow this footpath and you'll eventually hit the road.
sentences.cn: 沿着这条小路走,终会走上大路.

sentences.en: He said he had just picked up the druken man from the footpath and did not know him from Adam.
sentences.cn: 他说他只是把这个倒在人行道上的醉汉扶了起来，他根本不认识他。

sentences.en: Nancy wander for hour aimlessly along the intertwining road and footpath.
sentences.cn: 南茜毫无目的地在纵横交错大路与小径之间徘徊了几个小时.

sentences.en: Owners who allow their dogs to foul the footpath will be fined.
sentences.cn: 主人若放任狗弄脏人行道将受处罚.

sentences.en: Pedestrian footpath on ground level facing Tai Hong Street.
sentences.cn: 公共行人径位于地面,面向太康街.

sentences.en: Pedestrians keep to the sidewalk [ footpath ] !
Some seed fell along the footpath, and the birds came and ate it up.
sentences.cn: 有些种子散落在小路上，鸟儿飞来把它们吃光了。

sentences.en: The car parks are joined by a footpath.
sentences.cn: 停车场中间有一条人行道。

sentences.en: The children squared off the footpath to play hopscotch.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在人行道上划方格玩“跳方”游戏.

sentences.en: The sun was shining gloriously, so Karen and the old lady went along the footpath through the corn, where it was rather dusty.
sentences.cn: 那天艳阳高照，凯伦和老妇人沿着穿过玉米地的小路去教堂，一路上灰尘漫天。

sentences.en: This is a footpath ; cars are not allowed.
sentences.cn: 这是人行道, 不准汽车通行.

trans.tran_cn: 人行道，人行小径，小路，小径
trans.tran_en: a narrow path for people to walk along, especially in the country
